00025 #ifndef EOS_KERNEL_VARIANTDATA_H
00026 #define EOS_KERNEL_VARIANTDATA_H
00027 
00028 #include <string>
00029 
00030 #define VARIANT_TYPE_BOOLEAN    1
00031 #define VARIANT_TYPE_NUMERIC    2
00032 #define VARIANT_TYPE_STRING     3
00033 
00037 class VariantData
00038     {
00039     public:
00040         VariantData(bool value)        { setValue(value); }
00041         VariantData(double value)      { setValue(value); }
00042         VariantData(const char* value) { setValue(value); }
00043         //
00044         void setValue(bool value)        { this->booleanValue = value; this->type = VARIANT_TYPE_BOOLEAN; }
00045         void setValue(double value)      { this->numericValue = value; this->type = VARIANT_TYPE_NUMERIC; }
00046         void setValue(const char* value) { this->stringValue  = value; this->type = VARIANT_TYPE_STRING; }
00047         //
00048         bool isBoolean() { return this->type == VARIANT_TYPE_BOOLEAN; }
00049         bool isNumeric() { return this->type == VARIANT_TYPE_NUMERIC; }
00050         bool isString()  { return this->type == VARIANT_TYPE_STRING; }
00051         //
00052         bool        getBooleanValue() { return this->booleanValue; }
00053         double      getNumericValue() { return this->numericValue; }
00054         const char* getStringValue()  { return this->stringValue.c_str(); }
00055         //
00056     private:
00057         bool        booleanValue;  // type VARIANT_TYPE_BOOLEAN
00058         double      numericValue;  // type VARIANT_TYPE_NUMERIC
00059         std::string stringValue;   // type VARIANT_TYPE_STRING
00060         //
00061         char type;
00062     };
00063 
00064 #endif
